commandDescription: invoke Lightning web component Jest unit tests
errorNoPackageJsonFound:
No package.json file found in the project.
Run from the project root and make verify lwc-jest is installed.
Run `sfdx force:lightning:lwc:test:install --help` for installation details
errorInvalidFlags: Invalid flags set. Please run with only --debug or --watch, not both.
errorNoExecutableFound:
No lwc-jest executable found. Verify it is properly installed.
Run `sfdx force:lightning:lwc:test:install --help` for installation details
